food.name: Farm stand chicken chef’s salad

ingredients.ingredient_name: 2 boneless skinless chicken thighs, poached and shredded
1/4 cup julienned Applegate Farm Provolone Cheese
1/4 cup julienned Applegate Farm Honey Ham

food.description: Introducing the Farm Stand Chicken Chef's Salad – a vibrant and satisfying salad that combines the best of farm-fresh ingredients. With tender grilled chicken, crisp greens, colorful vegetables, creamy avocado, tangy feta cheese, and a zesty lemon herb dressing, this salad is a burst of flavors that will leave you craving more. Get ready to indulge in a healthy and delicious culinary experience!

customer_review.comment: The Farm Stand Chicken Chef's Salad is a true delight for the taste buds. The fresh, crunchy vegetables paired with tender grilled chicken and flavorful bacon create a harmonious blend of flavors and textures. The portion size is generous, making it a satisfying and wholesome meal option. The dressing is light and complements the ingredients perfectly. Overall, this salad is a delicious and refreshing choice for a light yet filling meal. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a tasty and nutritious salad option!
A solid choice for those looking for a healthy and filling salad option
